name: Treasure Buns
description:
Treasure Buns is a relaxing simulation game where you play as a small treasure hunter sailing from island to island in your small boat! Upgrade your boat, buy more treasure maps and explore the wide sea !

So we may update this later cause we weren't able to add all the mechanics we wanted but we still poured a lot of love into this lil game, hope u guys enjoy !

GAME DEVELOPED BY:

EMMANUEL ACOSTA (programmer)

GABRIELA SOTO (artist)
